items.sentence: Tom doesn\'t usually watch this kind of movie.
Tom doesn\'t want Mary to find out about this.
Tom told his children to get ready for school.
Tom told me that he had no time to read books.
Tom doesn\'t speak French as fluently as Mary.
Tom doesn\'t speak French, but his parents do.
Tom doesn\'t think anybody else wants to come.
Tom teaches French to his friends once a week.
You can\'t be hungry. You\'ve just had dinner.
Tom already knows what Mary is planning to do.
